column5: A month away until the DVD is released. The new trailer featuring great footage of tarpon, marlin, halibut and musky is now available http://www.helipress.com/kayakfishingmovie/  Working on getting a few DVDs to give away when its released  Jamie
cant wait should be good video
The shot at 2:50 is friggen awesome!!! I could just imagine the look on that guys face when that fish came flying out of the water like that!!! WOW  Sinker
The Marlin shot almost looks fake the fish is so big. Is there a story behind that?

The blue marlin was the first of the double header.  It weighed an estimated 250 pounds and pulled the kayak 11 miles in 4 hours. While the battle was on a striped marlin was hooked at the same time. Double header marlin from 4 kayaks.... nuts!
Here is the cover of the DVD, a pic of the marlin

What an awesome promo video. The more I watch and see yak fishin the more my internal need to get one and giver. I've fished from a yak lots of times and have always wanted one since my little brother got one. Maybe sooner than later...hmmmm.
Small boats, big fish.         Looks like somebody had a lotta fun makin' that movie, I'll keep an eye out
